mapper.select: SELECT a.attendance_id as attendance_id, s.school_name as school_name, s.user_id as user_id, a.check_in as check_in, u.name as name, a.lecture_id as lecture_id, a.assignment as assignment, a.done_date as done_date, a.test_score as test_score FROM attendance a inner join student s on a.user_id = s.user_id inner join user u on u.user_id = s.user_id where a.lecture_id = #{lectureId};
